statements: SELECT * FROM resource_utilization;
SELECT id, instance_id, cpu_utilization FROM resource_utilization WHERE storage_utilization > 50;
SELECT instance_id, billing_amount FROM resource_utilization ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM resource_utilization WHERE cpu_utilization < 20 AND memory_utilization > 80;
SELECT instance_id, SUM(cpu_utilization) AS total_cpu_utilization FROM resource_utilization GROUP BY instance_id HAVING total_cpu_utilization > 100;
SELECT id, instance_id, cpu_utilization FROM resource_utilization WHERE cpu_utilization > 0.8 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, instance_id, memory_utilization FROM resource_utilization WHERE memory_utilization < 0.5 ORDER BY memory_utilization ASC
SELECT instance_id, storage_utilization, billing_amount FROM resource_utilization WHERE storage_utilization > 0.6 AND billing_amount > 100 ORDER BY billing_amount DESC
SELECT instance_id, timestamp, billing_amount FROM resource_utilization WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT id, cpu_utilization, memory_utilization, storage_utilization, timestamp, billing_amount FROM resource_utilization WHERE cpu_utilization > 0.6 OR memory_utilization < 0.3 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM resource_utilization ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT resource_name, utilization FROM resource_utilization WHERE utilization > 0.8;
SELECT id, billing_amount, billing_date FROM billing_information WHERE billing_amount >= 100;
SELECT * FROM billing_information ORDER BY billing_date ASC;
SELECT id, resource_name, utilization, timestamp FROM resource_utilization WHERE resource_name = 'server';
SELECT * FROM resource_utilization ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT resource_name, utilization FROM resource_utilization WHERE utilization > 0.8;
SELECT resource_name, utilization, timestamp FROM resource_utilization WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM billing_information WHERE billing_amount > 100 ORDER BY billing_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, SUM(billing_amount) AS total_billing FROM billing_information GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM resource_utilization ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT resource_name, utilization FROM resource_utilization WHERE utilization > 0.5;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_information WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT resource_name, utilization FROM resource_utilization GROUP BY resource_name HAVING SUM(utilization) > 0.8;
SELECT customer_name, billing_amount FROM customer_information LEFT JOIN billing_information ON customer_information.id = billing_information.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM resource_utilization ORDER BY utilization DESC, resource_name ASC
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, utilization FROM resource_utilization WHERE utilization > 0.5
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM billing_information WHERE billing_amount > 1000 AND invoice_number LIKE 'INV-%'
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_information WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com' ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT * FROM resource_utilization;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, usage_start_date FROM resource_utilization WHERE resource_id = 1;
SELECT billing_id, resource_id, amount FROM resource_billing ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_accounts WHERE account_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM billing_history WHERE payment_status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM resource_utilization ORDER BY usage_start_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT resource_name, usage_start_date, usage_end_date FROM resource_utilization WHERE resource_type = 'server' ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_accounts WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT billing_id, amount, payment_status FROM billing_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY billing_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT customer_name, email, billing_date, amount FROM customer_accounts JOIN billing_history ON customer_accounts.account_id = billing_history.customer_id WHERE billing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM resources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resources;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT utilization_date, utilization_hours FROM resource_utilization;
SELECT bill_date, total_amount FROM billing_details;
SELECT * FROM resources ORDER BY resource_id ASC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_status FROM resources WHERE resource_type='Software' ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT b.bill_id, b.bill_date, p.payment_amount FROM billing_details b JOIN payments p ON b.bill_id = p.bill_id WHERE p.payment_amount >= 500 ORDER BY b.bill_date DESC;

SELECT r.resource_name, u.utilization_date, u.utilization_hours FROM resources r INNER JOIN resource_utilization u ON r.resource_id = u.resource_id WHERE u.utilization_hours < 10 ORDER BY u.utilization_date DESC;
